Title: January 2022
Content: *p69507a02032*20	  		*(iii)	a series of tests was performed on compound a.testobservation1addition of phosphorus(v) chloridemisty fumes2addition of 2,4‑dinitrophenylhydrazineorange precipitate3addition of benedict’s or fehling’s reagentsolution remains blue with no precipitate4addition of acidified potassium dichromate(vi)solution remains orange5test using polarimetryplane of plane polarised light is rotated			deduce the structure for compound a. justify your answer by using all the test results.(6)
